IF NOT EXISTS (select * from dbo.sysobjects where id = object_id(N'[dbo].[w2_TaskScheduleHistorySummary]') and OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsUserTable') = 1) BEGIN CREATE TABLE [dbo].[w2_TaskScheduleHistorySummary] ( [dept_id] [nvarchar] (30) NOT NULL DEFAULT (N''), [action_kbn] [nvarchar] (30) NOT NULL DEFAULT (N''), [action_master_id] [nvarchar] (30) NOT NULL DEFAULT (N''), [action_no] [int] NOT NULL DEFAULT (1), [action_result] [nvarchar] (10) NOT NULL DEFAULT (N''), [action_kbn_detail] [nvarchar] (30) NOT NULL DEFAULT (N''), [target_id] [nvarchar] (10) NOT NULL DEFAULT (N''), [history_count] [int] NOT NULL DEFAULT (0) ) ON [PRIMARY]
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[w2_TaskScheduleHistorySummary] WITH NOCHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [PK_w2_TaskScheduleHistorySummary] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [dept_id], [action_kbn], [action_master_id], [action_no], [action_result], [action_kbn_detail], [target_id] ) ON [PRIMARY] END
